name: Kotmale Pasteurised Full Cream Milk
description: Ready to Drink Kotmale Full cream Fresh Milk is 100% Sri Lankan, Fresh Cow's milk that is suitable for Vegetarians. Rs.50 cents from every 1L of fresh milk collected is contributed to a special welfare fund "Sarubima" focused on empowering Farmers children through education.      *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
